EmailTemplate.name: RE: Appointment Confirmation (1342031805.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Appointment Confirmation (1342031805.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Chris, You are very welcome! I hope we get the opportunity to work together as well. From the clients you listed below, I do not see any of them in our system at this point in time. If you do begin a relationship with them, I would be happy to work to get a contract in place between them and MBO on your behalf. In regards to the net cash estimate, I would be happy to create that for you, I just need a few more pieces of information. 1. Do you file as Married or Single for federal/state taxes2. How many withholding allowances do you take for state and federal3. Do you want the estimate to reflect full time? If so I tend to use 160 hours/month as a good baseline4. About how much a month do you expect to incur in business operating expenses (if you don’t know, it is not a big deal, this is so I can show how entering expenses can help lower your taxable income/increase your take home pay). Once I have this information I will be able to create/email the estimates to you for review. Thanks and have a great day!Nicolette From: Chris Allen [mailto:chrsalln@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 5:51 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Appointment Confirmation I enjoyed speaking with you today. Thank you for answering all my questions. I'm looking forward to the possibility of working with MBO.
As I said, I'm still in the idea stage. I've just started gathering a list of potential companies I might be interested in working with. In case you happen to have any consultants currently working at any of these companies, I've included a short list. Most of these are small companies; I'll be pleasantly surprised if you've worked with them. (I said "Trulia" on the phone, and knew that didn't sound right. The company I was thinking of was "Topia.")
Ascendent ID Avaunt Avue Technologies Continuant IdentityMine Multicare Nu Element Regence Blue Cross Topia
Thank you, Chris AllenOn Tue, Jul 10, 2012 at 12:03 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Chris, I just wanted to confirm that I will be calling you today at 5:00pm EST/2:00PM PST. If for some reason you are unable to speak below is a link to my calendar for you to schedule a better time for you. online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 <tel:703.793.6281>f: 703.793.6456 <tel:703.793.6456>e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
